channel.title: Scar Help ! i cant run any scripts
channel.description: ok i cant run any scripts cuz i get this errror [code]Line 649: [Error] (2762:18): Unknown identifier 'GetUpText' in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\GameTab.scar[/code] does ne1 knnow how to fix this error?

item.title: Scar Help ! i cant run any scripts
item.dc:creator: @inferno inferno
item.description:
@inferno wrote:

There is a folder in the include called “Put in plugins”. Open that folder, copy the “Box.dll” file and go to the scar plugins folder. Put the file in there.

Read full topic
item.source: Scar Help ! i cant run any scripts
